mapper.insert: insert into back_user_role (role_id, user_id, is_active, create_time, update_time) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into back_user_role
role_id,
user_id,
is_active,
create_time,
update_time,
#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isActive,jdbcType=BIT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.select:
select
from back_user_role where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_active = 1

select
from back_user_role where user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_active = 1 limit 1
